# Combined Absorbance and Fluorescence Spectrometer Tender Announcement
=====================================

### Tender Number and Reference

*   Tender Number: WS4438404277
*   Reference Number: Doc4462078442

### Amendment and Tender Details

*   Amendment Number: 2
*   Solicitation Number: WS4438404277
*   Publication Date: 2024-02-29
*   Tender Closing Date: 2024-04-03T14:00:00 (EST)
*   Amendment Date: 2024-03-22

### Tender Description

Canada is seeking offers to supply and deliver a combined absorbance and fluorescence spectrometer to CanmetENERGY Devon (CE-D). The instrument will be used for measuring absorbance and fluorescence of water samples containing oil or other dissolved organic compounds as part of the Marine Conservation Targets project. 

The instrument will be shipped to #1 Oil Patch Drive, Devon, Alberta, T9G 1A8, and all delivery charges to the destination must be included.

### Tendering Procedure

This tender is open to all qualified Offerors. The lowest price will be the selection criterion. 

### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Contact Information

For detailed information and to submit a bid, please refer to the Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18948858?extsite=MTg5NDg4NThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
